extension.name: OS Property Tag Cloud
extension.author: Ossolution
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Ossolution team. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This module displays an automatically generated tag cloud from the content on your OS Property Property data.

field.name: minsize
field.label: Min Font Size (px)
field.description: The size of the smallest element in the list of tags in pixels. Default 10.

field.name: maxsize
field.label: Max Font Size (px)
field.description: The size of the largest element in the list of tags in pixels. Default 25.

field.name: fontcolor
field.label: Font Color
field.description: Hexidecimal value for color of font displayed. Default #135cae.

field.name: tagcount
field.label: Word Count
field.description: The amount of words you would like to show in your tag cloud. Default 25.

field.name: limit
field.label: Property Limit
field.description: If you have hundreds of properties, you probably want to limit the results being queried. Default 10.

field.name: excludelist
field.label: Excluded Words
field.description: Write here words you would like to not be displayed in your tag cloud. (plurals will be excluded automatically, as will any word shorter than 3 chars.)

field.name: coladdress
field.label: Address
field.description: Add content from property address to tag cloud?

field.name: colptitle
field.label: Property Title
field.description: Add content from property title to tag cloud

field.name: colpshort
field.label: Short Description
field.description: Add content from property short description to tag cloud?

field.name: colpdesc
field.label: Property Description
field.description: Add content from property description to tag cloud?

field.name: colpcity
field.label: City
field.description: Add content from property city to tag cloud?

field.name: colpprovince
field.label: State/Province
field.description: Add content from property state/province to tag cloud?

field.name: colpcountry
field.label: Country
field.description: Add content from property country to tag cloud?

field.name: colctitle
field.label: Category Title
field.description: Add content from category titles to tag cloud?

field.name: colttitle
field.label: Property type
field.description: Add content from property types to tag cloud?
